mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a black and white photocopy of a photograph. The subject is a street scene. The building in the center has two signs: "Vess Taxi, Phone 395" and "Taxi Service." In front of the building six cars are parked and four men are posed next to the first four vehicles. Presumably each man is a taxi driver posed next to his cab.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Vess Taxi (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans
Virginia -- Lexington
